title: AWS Data Security to Azure Data Governance: Privacy, Compliance, and Data Protection
description: Master data security and governance by implementing AWS data protection and compliance frameworks, then migrating to Azure data governance equivalents with privacy controls, regulatory compliance, and comprehensive data protection strategies.
learningObjectives: Implement comprehensive data encryption and protection using AWS KMS and Azure Key Vault
Build data access controls and fine-grained permissions with IAM and Azure RBAC
Create data classification and sensitivity labeling with Macie and Purview
Design data privacy and compliance frameworks for GDPR, CCPA, and industry regulations
Implement data lineage tracking and audit trails for governance
Build automated compliance monitoring and reporting systems
prerequisites: Completion of all previous DEA-C01 labs (Ingestion, Storage, Operations)
Understanding of data security concepts and compliance frameworks
Basic knowledge of encryption, access controls, and privacy regulations
Familiarity with data governance principles and practices
businessScenario: SecureData Financial operates in a highly regulated environment processing sensitive customer financial data across multiple jurisdictions. They must implement comprehensive data security and governance frameworks complying with GDPR, PCI DSS, SOX, and regional banking regulations. The data governance team needs to ensure data protection, privacy compliance, audit readiness, and secure data sharing across AWS and Azure platforms while maintaining operational efficiency.

troubleshooting.issue: Complex compliance requirements across multiple jurisdictions and regulations
troubleshooting.solution: Implement flexible policy frameworks, use automated compliance monitoring, create jurisdiction-specific controls, implement data localization, and use comprehensive audit trails

troubleshooting.issue: Performance impact from encryption and security controls on data operations
troubleshooting.solution: Optimize encryption algorithms, use hardware security modules, implement intelligent caching, optimize key management, and use performance monitoring

troubleshooting.issue: Data privacy and access control conflicts in complex multi-tenant environments
troubleshooting.solution: Implement hierarchical access controls, use attribute-based access control, implement data isolation, create clear data ownership, and use automated conflict resolution
